item.title: TryHackMe Simple CTF
item.description:
OverView
Simple CTF
room Simple CTF

Task 01: Simple CTF

How many services are running under port 1000?

recon

  • nmap

    sudo nmap -p 0-999 10.10.38.103 -v -oN 1000-port
